name: Understaffed
description:
Welcome to Understaffed!

In this airport simulator game you will be expected to:

- Direct passengers to the correct gate.
- Load luggage onto the correct plane, sorted by size.
- Pay attention to passenger tickets, they will only tell you once!

CONTROLS:

Keyboard & Mouse

WASD to MOVE
E  to INTERACT
Left & Right Arrows to DIRECT PASSENGERS

Gamepad

Left Analog Stick to MOVE / A button to INTERACT
X & B buttons
to DIRECT PASSENGERS

Music is royalty free - Credit to:

Airport Lounge Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
